twitrsvp

This projected started with Corey Donohoe & his interest to use twitter to invite some friends for a beer with the details of who was actually going. I became friends with Corey midway through his development of the app, and he was really excited by my work, and asked myself and Tyler Montgomery to help with UI, UX, and branding. Working on this project didnâ€™t only build a fun little project but a great friendship. The project has now become open source for others to take on!
